channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report X-2025050193
item.description:
Report X-2025050193

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-01T01:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-01
  • City: NORTH LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ABF stated forklift operator Lucas Wooten was unloading freight from trailer 501646 when the blades were too long and went through the pallet on the other end and punctured the bottom of the tote that was behind the pallet causing an active spill. ABF stated there are no waterways or drains effecte d.
